globeInsights.title: Brazil
globeInsights.description: Returned to the top five after a boom in small-scale PV as a result of a successful net-metering scheme.

globeInsights.title: Philippines
globeInsights.description: The fourth most attractive market for clean energy investment thanks to strong renewable energy policies.

globeInsights.title: India
globeInsights.description: The most attractive market for clean energy investment

globeInsights.title: Morocco
globeInsights.description: Ranked fifth within Africa. It has recently implemented bold renewable energy targets and unlocked the medium-voltage grid for net metering.

globeInsights.title: China
globeInsights.description: Home to 60% of global EV sales

globeInsights.title: South Africa
globeInsights.description: Attracted the third highest investment for clean energy projects among emerging markets (excluding mainland China)

globeInsights.title: Oman
globeInsights.description: The only Middle Eastern market featuring among the top 20 Climatescope scores

globeInsights.title: Greece
globeInsights.description: Announced plans to add 3 gigawatts of battery energy storage capacity in support of its 2030 goal
